# Messages to the Bride and Groom

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
#| message: false
#| warning: false

suppressWarnings({
  suppressMessages({

# Read CSV file
messages <- read.csv("www/messages.csv")
})
})

# Print messages in formatted HTML
cat("<div class='comments'>")
for(i in 1:nrow(messages)) {
  # Print the message to the couple with timestamp
  cat(paste0("<div class='message from-guest'>",
             "<h4>", messages$name[i], " <span class='timestamp'>", messages$time[i], "</span></h4>",
             "<p>", messages$message[i], "</p>",
             "</div>"))
  # Print the response from the couple with timestamp if it exists
  if (!is.na(messages$response[i])) {
    cat(paste0("<div class='message from-couple'>",
               "<h4>Sorina and Thomas <span class='timestamp'>", messages$response_time[i], "</span></h4>",
               "<p>", messages$response[i], "</p>",
               "</div>"))
  }
}
cat("</div>")
```
